IGPUPipeline

The IGPUPipeline object is used to create a graph of GPU shaders that will process images.  A pipeline is built out of a series of IGPUPipelineNode's. Each node is conceptually just a pixel shader to be run on its input image data.  The general structure of a GPU graph looks something like:

IGPUPipelineSourceNode  IGPUPipelineNode  IGPUPipelineSinkNode +------------+  +--------------+  +------------------+

|----------->  |              |---------> |                  |

+------------+  +--------------+  +------------------+

There can be multiple IGPUPipelineSourceNodes and IGPUPipelineNodes. IGPUPipelineNodes can have multiple input sources but always generate a single output.  The graph uses a pull model. Each node will call GetOutputTexture() on its source nodes, which in turn will run Process on that node.

Functions
GetRenderer
virtual CRefObj<IRenderer> GetRenderer() = 0

Returns the Renderer associated with this pipeline

RenderQuad
virtual void RenderQuad(
IShader *pShader
) = 0

Draws the shader using a fullscreen quad

Process
virtual void Process() = 0

Executes the pipeline

CreateSourceNode
virtual CRefObj<IGPUPipelineSourceNode> CreateSourceNode(
IImage *pImage,
uint32 outputWidth,
uint32 outputHeight,
DXGI_FORMAT format = DXGI_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM
) = 0

Returns a source node. The source node will feed the pipeline with the specified image.

Parameters
pImage
IImage*

image to feed through pipeline

format
DXGI_FORMAT

format of output texture

CreateSinkNode
virtual CRefObj<IGPUPipelineSinkNode> CreateSinkNode(
IShader *pShader,
uint32 outputWidth,
uint32 outputHeight,
DXGI_FORMAT format = DXGI_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM
) = 0

Returns a sink node.

Parameters
pShader
IShader*

shader to run on inputs

format
DXGI_FORMAT

format of output texture

CreateNode
virtual CRefObj<IGPUPipelineNode> CreateNode(
IShader *pShader,
uint32 outputWidth,
uint32 outputHeight,
DXGI_FORMAT format = DXGI_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM
) = 0

Returns a GPU node that makes up part of the pipeline.

Parameters
pShader
IShader*

shader to run on inputs

format
DXGI_FORMAT

format of output texture
